title: $6,000 first place! - Seeking D4+ players from Canberra for Reload Tournament

embed.description: 10,000 PRIZE POOL SPLIT BETWEEN TOP 4 TEAMS GUARANTEED RIOT PRIZING FOR THE TOP 32 TEAMS OPEN TO ALL COMMUNITY (NON-PRO) TEAMS A MASSIVE LIVE ARENA FINAL - PLAY IN FRONT OF THOUSANDS!

body:
Hi Friends,

Only 12 days left before the reload tournament. ($10,000 total prize pool, first place $6,000)

As such I am looking for 4 dedicated players to join me in victory and put some money in your back pockets.

Looking for everything but jungle, and if you feel you could be an analyst/coach that will be able to provide valuable input feel free to shoot me a message as well.

We will be training 11/12 days over the next 12 days before the tournament in 3-4 hour blocks of structured practice with set goals and facing opponents providing resistance to suss out our major issues early on and address them in a timely manner.

Preferably looking for Diamond 4+ mature players that are prepared to put a good amount of effort into the training sessions coming over the next 12 days prior to the tournament.

If interested, please reply to this thread or contact me in game (IGN: Big Slammu) and we can discuss further. Looking to form the team in the next two days and begin practice on Wednesday night between 6-10pm.

Look forward to hearing from you!
Slammu

replies.body:
D5 Support Main.

IGN: ix Sonic x
